alert.note: Alert for Isle of Wight; Southampton; Suffolk (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 3:28PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Isle of Wight, and southeastern Southampton Counties, the City of Franklin and the central City of Suffolk through 415 PM EDT... At 328 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Franklin, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Franklin around 340 PM EDT. Holland, Carrsville and Hunterdale around 345 PM EDT. Sedley around 355 PM EDT. Windsor around 405 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Vicksville, Berlin, Lummis, Cleopus, Dort, Indika, Somerton, Collosse, Lees Mill and Riverdale. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
